item.description:
After your Thanksgiving on Thursday, come join us for Thankskeeping on Sunday. Brunch, that is. Do you know what's good after having your fill of turkey and stuffing? Pancakes. You know what's also good? After hearing about how Mother Earth provided your repast, or a Burning Bush was responsible for the bounty, celebrating the real producers: you.

Come pour some syrup on that.

When: Sunday, November 30, 11am
Where: White Horse Tavern, 116 Brighton Ave. Allston, MA
Why: Because bacon makes everything better
What: (to do) RSVP so that I may reserve a spot for you (but come anyway, even if you haven't RSVPed!)

The food is $10.45/person, but the conversation is free.

Look for the $ sign bling!

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Thankskeeping Meetup
